name: my-rn-framework
description: React Native Framework for brownfield integration - Package as XCFramework/AAR for embedding in native iOS/Android apps

scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform android --dev false --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:ios:debug: react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:android:debug: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform android --dev true --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules ios/Pods ios/build android/build android/app/build
scripts.pod:install: cd ios && bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod:update: cd ios && bundle exec pod update
